Title.evidence: A Randomised Controlled Trial on Extracellular Vesicles in PRBC Transfusion

Participants.evidence: Participants included 23 postoperative ICU patients: 5 after open aortic surgery, 9 after bilateral lung transplantation, and 9 after other surgeries. Eligibility criteria included age 18-99 years and PRBC transfusion postoperatively.

Intervention.evidence: Plasma samples were collected three times before and after leukoreduced PRBC transfusion at 30-min intervals.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Total EVs, EryEVs, total PEVs, and GEVs increased post-transfusion compared to baseline in the entire cohort.
